purpose: Provide a comprehensive list of open-source libraries and tools for deploying large language models (LLMs) in production environments
principle: Aggregates and curates resources related to LLM deployment, including libraries, frameworks, and tools that facilitate production use cases
reusability: Serves as a reference guide for developers looking to implement LLMs in production, offering a curated list of resources and tools
limitations: Primarily a static resource list; does not include dynamic updates or direct integrations
name: awesome-production-llm
description: A curated list of awesome open-source libraries for production LLM
